name: Overthrowing the Network State with Coordi-Nations
description:
THEORY

09:30 - 11:00: Reporting on the concept of post-Westphalian sovereignties: Theoretical models and various legal and governance frameworks for post-Westphalian sovereignties

11:00 - 12:30: Panel with audience participation (fish-bowl format): Conceptualising Sovereignty, Autonomy, Agency, etc.

14:00 - 17:00 Roundtable discussions:

  1. Challenges and opportunities in our attempts to implement post-Westphalian sovereignties
  2. Dealing with plurinationalism and the issues of overlapping jurisdictions.
